amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? TITLE X--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? SEC. 10001. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used for the Advanced Law Enforcement Rapid Response Training Program (ALERRT).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being made available for the Advanced Law Enforcement Rapid Response Training Program (ALERRT).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A023) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A023) Failed by voice vote.
